name: The Hidden Axis
description:
GAME:

As a deathly hush expands from the north, the burning settlements of Kurasin send out calls for help... It is up to the last stronghold, Westwind, to answer those calls... with a call to arms.

A super simple Army management clicker! 

Created for Quarter Annual DG Jam v3.

CONTROLS  &  INSTRUCTIONS:

In the battle UI, the red bar is the unit's health and the green bar is the unit's special meter. 

During Battles you can zoom in and out with the mouse wheel.

Use the Warrior's Command (sword icon) as soon as it becomes available. Other commands are best paired with specific timing.

Using Army Commands:

  • Bow and Arrow Army Command - all Rangers fire.
  • Sword Army Command - all Warriors use their special attack.
  • Fireball Army Command - all Witches unleash a powerful aoe.
  • Heart Army Command - all Priests cast an aoe heal.
